name: the museum of museums
description:
This game is a museum for some of museums created by Pippin Barr.

I tried to include the most interesting ones but some shapes are hard to draw.
Since this is my first time using Unity, everything is kinda buggy. If something bad happens to you, please restart the game and pray for the better.

Directionals move the player, Mouse rotates it - just like a decent FPS
